divs: sighting detailsit's been a few years since my sighting in southern california although i just recently heard about the mufon sight on tv and wanted to share my observation. i was gardening in my back yard and something caught my eye very high in the sky (almost as if they were star like) facing south of my location. i saw 10 objects, 9 small and 1 larger, very reflective and bright, similar to stars (brightness) although in the clear, daytime sky. the 9 smaller objects moved around slowly in many different patterns and directions although the movement seemed well coordinated. once in a while they (the smaller objects) would have very quick bursts of speed and move around the larger object. the larger object seemed to move slowly, directly from west to east, stopping or at least slowing at times when the 9 smaller objects moved into the triangular shapes (see next paragraph). the overall group was progressivly moving from west to east. as i was watching the objects, the 9 small objects moved into 3 perfect triangular shapes for a few minutes. they then moved out of the symetrical shapes and moved around as when i first sighted them. after a few minutes they then moved back into the 3 perfect triangular shapes. this went on, repeating for about 20 minutes. all of the objects stayed relativly close to each other and the attachment hopefully will give you an idea of what i saw. 1.) my location. in my back yard. i was gardening at the time. 2.) the brightness as if stars in the daytime caught my attention. 3.) i could not tell what the objects were (they were too high in the sky) although the movements were well coordinated and controlled. 4.) description is in the text above. 5.) the feelings; amazement with almost a disbelief feeling \ very happy feeling. my reaction; i tried to call some of my friends for them to go out and look (no luck getting in touch with anyone in the area). i also called my local police dept but they did not seem to be too interested. i walked to the front of my home to see if anyone was out in the neighborhood but could not locate anyone. during this time i did not want to lose sight of the objects and just kept observing. after sighting the objects i just felt a happy feeling, almost content that i witnessed something amazing. 6.) i lost sight of them after about 20 minutes. they seemed to just move very quckly to a point in which they were out of my vision. this was very quick and faster than you can blink your eye. attached is a drawing of what i saw. thank you.
